body:
# Welcome to PileMd

Pile **Markdown** notes.

* Phenomenon User Interface
* Beautiful highlight, comfortable completing

## Features

* Note listing as time line (updated / created)
* Syncing with local files
* Text searching
* Beautiful inline code highlight
* Comfy completing by syntax
* Pasting images
* Exporting notes
* Share on [Qiita](http://qiita.com/)
